```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(dplyr)
library(sqldf)
library(data.table)
```

read in base data
```{r}
matches_ts <-readRDS("data/input_cleaned/matches_cleaned_ts.rds")%>%setDT()
rankings_ts <-readRDS("data/input_cleaned/rankings_cleaned_ts.rds")%>%setDT()

source("functions/merge_rankings_matches.R")
source("functions/create_pit_features.R")
```

Create
-last 9 matches features
- ranking features
```{r}
rankings_features <- merge_rankings_matches(matches_ts,rankings_ts) 
rm(rankings_ts)

pit_features <- create_pit_features(matches_ts,rankings_features,n=c(9,3))
```

save data
```{r}
saveRDS(pit_features,"data/current_pit/input_cleaned_pit_predictions.rds")
fwrite(pit_features,"data/current_pit/input_cleaned_pit_predictions.csv")
```
